---
title: "RA R Orientation"
---

Has your mentor and/or advisor told you to learn *R*? Need to learn *R* and you need to learn it now? Well your in **luck**! 

[RA R Orientation]() is dedicated to students who know nothing about *R*, but need to get started. The [curriculum]() for this short course will get you going with the basics as well as how to use *R Studio* to manage projects.

To get started, take a look through the [curriculum page]().
